Every moment is beautiful

My name is Jeff, a Front-end Web Designer specializing in Graphic, User Experience, and Interaction Design, with an unparalleled dedication to refinement, craftsmanship, and attention to detail.

I am a firm believer in continuous improvement. My current focus in HTML5, CSS3, and knowledge in JS frameworks allow me to streamline my workflows to design, code, and optimize prototypes from scratch. This is because I believe in delivering the best, most effective user experience for you.

The skills and experience acquired in the past must be used accordingly to tackle new challenges. I adapt to the constantly changing user requirements. I design digital assets that are elegant and simple without sacrificing usability.

Technical Proficiency

Photoshop HTML5 CSS3 Vanilla JS Pure.css Preprocessors Webpack Git User Experience Interaction DesignIllustrator

By making careful adjustments to what is already simple, I can turn anything ordinary into something extraordinary.

After years of experience communicating and understanding the needs of different end-users through personas and market research, I began to notice patterns. It came to my realization that the most impactful and memorable experiences are accomplished by taking simple, efficient design approaches. Why take the more complicated path when there is a shorter one to reach the destination?

I have designed high-fidelity mockups, prototypes, e-blasts, banners, and wireframes for my clients including Sun Life Financial, DossierView, various tech startups, and BMO Financial Group.

It starts here

Let’s collaborate and create something amazing for your customers. From Web banners, e-blasts, prototypes, mockups, concepts to development, I am available for full-time employment. Thank you for your visit.

Jeff Siswanto

Web Designer
